body: holy shit i actually got invested in this
@ジャバウォック王 Well... Holy shit. Now this bs all makes sense. It's a timeloop in a what if world. It's his busty mother who arranged all this. Well the more you know...
Well shit, so the first girl he fucked is actually his mother.
Oh god, I typoed a lot, it's not tume but time, sorry.

The protag doesnt tume travel. To be more precise, it's time loop. Protagonist is actually dead in the real world. He and his family died in a traffic accident, leaving only his sister alive. His mother then pleaded to the gods and prostitute herself to the gods, becoming an angel. She then use her authority, along with her husband's help, to create a What If world where protag lives on. This is why the protag doesn't have any memory about the past, since it is an imaginary world. The series of tume loops are just a series of what if scenarios plotted by his mother.
wow, a lot of variety with the girls
Hmm the raw is weird but maybe the MC is a time traveler or some shit like that? Idk maybe...
What the fuck is happening?!? I love this but I understand nada of it lmao
Nice, thanks, hopefully we get the translation @diXycoms
